title: Data Worker
text:
Data Worker who transforms complex data into clear, actionable insights through visualization, modeling, and evidence-based storytelling. I am passionate about using data to understand people, systems, and real-world challenges. My goal is to make insights accessible, meaningful, and useful for better decision-making.
View portfolio Download CV Let’s talk



  



  



  



  




8+
Years in data


20+
Projects delivered


-30%
Reporting time
Statistician and Data Scientist with extensive experience managing multidisciplinary and strategic analytical projects. Expert in processing and analyzing large volumes of data to generate key insights for decision-making. Proven track record in diverse fields including mobility, culture, health, fintech, marketing, education, nutrition, environment, social development, Indigenous communities, financial technology, and public policy. Known for my capacity for self-learning, adaptability to new technologies, and strong results-oriented mindset. Proficient in statistical sampling, multivariate methods, and predictive modeling, with advanced command of Python, R, SQL, and cloud-based analytical environments.

title: Data Worker
text:
What I do


Statistical Design & Sampling
Methodological designs, sampling frames, and survey/redesign work for public policy, culture, environment, and mobility.


Predictive & Risk Modeling
Crash risk, health, and forecasting models using Python/R (multivariate methods, imputation, simulations, ML).


Analytics & Data Products
Dashboards and KPIs in Power BI/Quarto; indicators and metadata to operationalize decisions in government and industry.


Training & Facilitation
Workshops and courses in R/Python, risk analysis, and data literacy for teams, universities, and public agencies.
